actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the excise tax on medical devices.

summary.text:
Protect Medical Innovation Act of 2019

This bill repeals the excise tax on the sale of a medical device by the manufacturer, producer, or importer.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the excise tax on medical devices.
